site_name: Former Post Office Site Ashdown Road Kingston Upon Thames
description: Application under Section S96a Non Material Amendment to Condition 2 (approved plans) of Planning Permission 18/12217/FUL (Variation of condition 2 (plans) of planning permission 17/12378/FUL (Erection of new buildings of 4 to 16 storeys in height and part demolition, alterations and change of use of Former Post Office and Former Telephone Exchange listed buildings to provide retail/ cafe/ restaurant uses (A1-A5 use) and flexible floorspace to be used for either retail/caf√©/restaurant uses (A1-A5) or Office (B1), Office (B1) floorspace and community/leisure (D1/D2 use) and 320 residential units) The application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement Addendum and updated Technical report Addendums.) to provide: Design amendments for internal penetrations for building services, splice basement steel work and introducing 2no. steel columns and external soil vent pipes and WC vents through external wall at 6 Ashdown Road Kingston Upon Thames KT1 2FQ
